name:

description: This is an update for the LEGO速 Marvel's Avengers game. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full version of LEGO速 Marvel's Avengers.
disclaimer:

Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
